title: S3 Ep146: Heaven, Can You Hear Me? w/ Gian Temperelli - Hr.3
itunes:title: Heaven, Can You Hear Me? w/ Gian Temperelli - Hr.3
description: Darkness Radio welcomes Author Investigator Gian Temperelli to the show to talk about his touching first hand biography on the life of Psychic/Medium Peter James, using his words and memories.  Gian shares memories of Peter with us on this touching third hour of the show...
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
